content: Analyze current component structure and identify migration priorities
Migrate MultiUserBudgetTable to ShadCN Table components with inline editing
Migrate MultiUserSummary to beautiful card-based layout with ShadCN components
Migrate Login, Register, ProfileSetup forms to ShadCN Form components
Migrate ImportModal and PartnershipManager to ShadCN Dialog components
Test all migrated components for functionality and mobile responsiveness
